content: lion brand pattern # 40414 *cce-mondrianblanket pdf* skill level intermediate level 3 cotton-ease® original article #700 5 colors 14 balls total *cotton-ease® original article #700 has been discontinued cotton-ease article #830 can be substituted * crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm bobbins blanket has no border leave strands long enough to weave in on wrong side color chart is provided for working color changes chart is read from right to left on right side row and left to right on wrong side row afghan is worked in single_crochet u s
